product_name: Bern Cougar Snow Helmet - Women's - 2012 Overstock
long_description: The Bern Cougar snow helmet is ready for a day of zipping around the mountain. Bern Cougar helmet features a removable visor and an adjustable slider system for a great fit and superior comfort. Lightweight polycarbonate shell and seamless ZipMold liquid foam technology ensure a high strength-to-weight ratio. Helmet is low profile, so it doesn't feel like it's riding above your head. Winter liner keeps you cozy on cold days and is easily removed for warm-weather antics. Air channels keep your head cool and your goggles free of fog. Rear clip keeps goggles strap from sliding off helmet; eyewear channel accommodates glasses. Adjustable chin strap keeps helmet firmly in place. Bern Cougar helmet meets ASTM F 2040 standard for snow and ski use, and CPSC and EN 1078 for bike and skate use. Overstock.
